Invocations for sitting between two pros.TRANSLATED_TEXT: (My Lord forgive me, My Lord forgive me.)

Invocations for sitting between two pros.ARABIC_TEXT: ((اللَّهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِي، وَارْحَمْنِي، وَاهْدِنِي، وَاجْبُرْنِي، وَعَافِنِي، وَارْزُقْنِي، وَارْفَعْنِي)).
Invocations for sitting between two pros.LANGUAGE_ARABIC_TRANSLATED_TEXT: (Allahummagh-fir lee, warhamnee, wahdinee, wajburnee, waAAafinee, warzuqnee warfaAAnee.)
Invocations for sitting between two pros.TRANSLATED_TEXT: (O Allah, forgive me, have mercy upon me, guide me, enrich me, give me health, grant me sustenance and raise my rank.)
